sentences.en: A Gourmandize Salad, Chicken Kebab and a bottle of beer.
sentences.cn: 一份美食沙拉, 烤鸡肉串和一瓶啤酒.

sentences.en: But a shish kebab is one of the healthiest choices on the fast - food circuit.
sentences.cn: 但一串羊肉串是快餐食品中最健康的选择之一.

sentences.en: Can you tell me how to make barbecued kebab?
sentences.cn: 你能跟我说下怎么做烤肉 吗 ?

sentences.en: Divorce aIways gives me an appetite. Kebab?
sentences.cn: 离婚总是使我胃口大开. 肉串?

sentences.en: Famished, I went to try the Persian shish kebab with pomegranate sauce.
sentences.cn: 极其饥饿的我想尝试石榴汁波斯羊肉串.

sentences.en: He said even the Uighur kebab sellers , who unconnected to the factory group, have moved out.
sentences.cn: 他说,城里那些与此并无关系的卖烤肉的维族人也都搬走了.

sentences.en: Hundreds of food stalls in this street stock with everything from shish kebab to soup.
sentences.cn: 这条街上的上百个小吃店供应各种吃的,从烤肉串到汤一应俱全.

sentences.en: It will be perfect with the Chicken Kebab.
sentences.cn: 和鸡肉串一起吃会很棒.

sentences.en: Nicky: I could murder a kebab.
sentences.cn: 尼基: 我想吃烤小羊肉了.

sentences.en: None of those childish kebab stories you get in so many travel books these days.
sentences.cn: 这年头你很难在旅游书里看到那些孩子气的烤肉串的故事了.

sentences.en: She particularly relishes fried rabbit - heads, the Sichuan version of late - night kebab.
sentences.cn: 她尤其喜欢炸兔头, 这是英国深夜烤肉串的四川版.

trans.tran_cn: （印度）烤腌羊肉串，肉串上的肉块
trans.tran_en: small pieces of meat and vegetables cooked on a stick
